about_the_game:
The Skyward Structure Style Pack is a free content pack that adds three additional structure styles to PixARK Skyward:

  • Starry Sky City Style: Give your structures a more regal look with this new style.

  • Sky City Style: Add a touch of magic and whimsy to your structures with this new style.

  • Alien City Style: A futuristic technological design for an out-of-this-world visual style.

    After downloading you will be able to craft structures using these new styles with the Exquisite Architectural Hut, which can be unlocked at level 65.

    Enjoy crafting new and amazing structures using these additional styles!
detailed_description:
The Skyward Structure Style Pack is a free content pack that adds three additional structure styles to PixARK Skyward:

  • Starry Sky City Style: Give your structures a more regal look with this new style.

  • Sky City Style: Add a touch of magic and whimsy to your structures with this new style.

  • Alien City Style: A futuristic technological design for an out-of-this-world visual style.

    After downloading you will be able to craft structures using these new styles with the Exquisite Architectural Hut, which can be unlocked at level 65.

    Enjoy crafting new and amazing structures using these additional styles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
